resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105801</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105801</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974144</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Environment Resources, facts and animations for UK teachers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umgebung Betriebsmittel, Tatsachen und Animationen
für BRITISCHE Lehrer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ressources, faits et animations d'environnement 
pour les professeurs BRITANNIQUES</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Recursos, fatos e animations do ambiente para 
professores BRITÂNICOS</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risorse, fatti ed animazioni dell'ambiente per gli
insegnanti BRITANNICI</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχεία συμπεριφοράς, γεγονότα και ζωτικότητες 
περιβάλλοντος για τους βρετανικούς δασκάλους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Recursos, hechos y animaciones del ambiente para 
los profesores BRITÁNICOS</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Play our fun environmental games, watch and interact with our animations, wise up on some facts and figures and download our screensavers - and learn about the environment at the same time.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">Europe</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <language>cy</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Spielen Sie unsere Spaßklimaspiele, überwachen 
Sie und wirken Sie auf unsere Animationen ein, die oben auf einigen 
Tatsachen und Abbildungen klug sind und downloaden Sie unsere 
screensavers - und erlernen Sie über die Umgebung gleichzeitig.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jouez nos jeux environnementaux d'amusement, les 
observez et agissez l'un sur l'autre avec nos animations, sages vers 
le haut sur quelques faits et figures et téléchargez nos 
screensavers - et renseignez-vous sur l'environnement en même temps.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Jogue nossos jogos ambientais do divertimento, 
preste-os atenção e interaja-os com nossos animations, sábios acima
em alguns fatos e figuras e download nossos screensavers - e 
aprenda-os sobre o ambiente ao mesmo tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gioc i nostri giochi ambientali di divertimento, 
guardi ed interagiscasi con le nostre animazioni, saggie in su su 
alcuni fatti e figure e trasferisca i nostri screensavers dal sistema 
centrale verso i satelliti - ed impari circa l'ambiente allo stesso 
tempo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Παίξτε τη διασκέδασή μας που τα περιβαλλοντικά 
παιχνίδια, προσέχουν και αλληλεπιδρούν με τις ζωτικότητες, σοφό 
επάνω σε μερικά γεγονότα και τους αριθμούς μας και μεταφορτώνουν 
τα screensavers μας - και μαθαίνουν για το περιβάλλον συγχρόνως.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Juegue nuestros juegos ambientales de la 
diversión, mírelos y obre recíprocamente con nuestras animaciones, 
sabias para arriba en algunos hechos y figuras y descargue nuestros 
screensavers - y aprenda sobre el ambiente en el mismo tiempo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1805974144</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105801</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/environment-resources-facts-and-animations-for-uk-teachers</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
